data.name: css-layout-basic
data.input_html:
{"index":{"name":"index","ext":"jade","mode":"text/x-jade","src":"doctype html
html
  head
    style(data-include='_reset')
    style(data-include='index')
  body
    .container
      .header Header
      .content
        .content__left(data-include='_content')
        .content__right(data-include='_content')
      .footer Footer"},"_content":{"name":"_content","ext":"html","mode":"text/html","src":"
Sed sit amet molestie diam. Etiam adipiscing dictum eros, vitae feugiat augue convallis sit amet. Nunc quis massa non dolor dictum condimentum.

data.name: template
data.input_js:
{"index":{"name":"index","ext":"ls","mode":"text/x-livescript","src":"
component = app.component = new Component!

component.init = !->
  _this = @; console.log 'jQuery!'
  routes =
    '/?((\w|.)*)': (content) !-> 
      console.log content
      _this.animateContent!
      $ '#content' .html app.data['_content/' + content]
  router = Router routes
  router.init!

  #router.setRoute 'home'
"},"component":{"name":"component","ext":"ls","mode":"text/x-livescript","src":"
Component = (o) !->
Component:: =
  constructor: Component
  init: !->
    
  animateContent: !->
    content = (document.getElementById 'content')
    content.className = 'fadeIn animated'
    setTimeout (!-> content.className = ''), 300
    window.scrollTo 0, 0
  
#if typeof module == 'object' then module.exports = Component
"}}
